title: Agreement to lease the land is executed by land owning authority with the Co-operative Housing Socie
clause_text: Agreement to lease the land is executed by land owning authority with the Co-operative Housing Society of the rehabilitated hutment dwellers after completing necessary formalities; And
section: POSSESSION OF THE TENEMENTS / SHOP Possession of the rehabilitation tenement / shop shall be handed over to any eligible hutment dweller only after,
